divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my bed reading a novel when three spheres were floating in the sky.I got a better view of the u.f.o. when it started streaking across the sky. I lost sight of the red blue and yellow balls. felt frightened and scared.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Graham
There were no other sightings in Graham on or around January 13th 2011
